pageContext.claim: “Well, the Russians had no impact on our votes whatsoever.  But, certainly, there was meddling and probably there was meddling from other countries and maybe other individuals. ”
pageContext.analysis: Trump regularly claims that Russian meddling in the 2016 election is fake news. While this statement is a departure from his typical stance, none of the intelligence reports that have been released suggest meddling by countries or individuals other than Russia.
